page.title: 14FARM SURVEY page 5
page.content: {Broden Hill Farm The farm has 200 acres, 18 fields for crops and grass including hay and silage. They have 11 fields for hay and silage.They also have 6 fields for pastures. {Crops They grow potatoes, barley, swede and kale. {Animals They have 61 milking cows and 150 breeding ewes. Lambs for meat at 1.7.85, 69 (rest sold) and they have 10 chickens and two geese.{ {Machines They have a combine, baler, silage harvester, plough and cultavation equipment, trailers, etc. There are five tractors.{ {Workers There are two farmers and one full time workman
